content: The yellow banner in the 2018Sep ballot for SDC says it is "based on FHIR Version 2.5.0". I am pretty sure that used to say, 3.5.0, or at least that I saw somewhere that it said 3.5.0. Did something go wrong with the page generation?
Yeah, that's out to lunch. It's actually 2.5.0 of the SDC spec, not FHIR. However, that's the old ballot. New ballot is here: http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/sdc/2019may
(Opens tomorrow, so if you're not signed up yet, today's your last chance...)
Yes, it is -- thanks! I did sign up. If I were to start reviewing today, would I just keep track of any GForge issues and add them the ballot spreadsheet?
